definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Besides, there are very few skilled stone workers left after the war years.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在戰後年代之後，有技術的石工寥寥無幾。

sentences.english: Added Only the head and one attached to an Body of Pein.
sentences.chinese: 新增只有頭和一個附加到身體的石工。

sentences.english: The 22 buildings including the four of the old masonry buildings were destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 包括舊石工建築物中的四楝建築物是破壞。

sentences.english: The huge stone blocks were chiseled off the hill body by numerous stoneworkers laboring arduously.
sentences.chinese: 經過衆多石工艱苦勞作，此碑大體鑿就。

sentences.english: All human towers are now unaffected by masonry.
sentences.chinese: 塔現在不能隨着升級石工術來增加胡甲了。

definition: chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
river conservancy works (dike maintenance, dredging etc)/river conservancy worker
Zaoqiao or Tsaochiao township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
